document_data.caption: Kae Deverell as the avatar of Bhaal.
document_data.name: Kae Deverell
document_data.mainbody: Lord Commander '''Kae Deverell''' was a [[human]] member of the [[Purple Dragons]] of [[Cormyr]] and of the [[Harpers]] who was stationed at the stronghold of [[High Horn]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Waterdeep|65-73|4}} He was possessed by the god [[Bhaal]], Lord of Murder, and became his new [[avatar]] during the [[Time of Troubles]].
document_data.History:
During the Time of Troubles in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, he helped the then-human [[Kelemvor]] and [[Midnight]], who were pursued by [[Cyric]] and his men.{{cite book/Waterdeep|124-127|7}}

However, Deverell's spirit was not destroyed and was left searching for an entrance to the [[Fugue Plane]] in [[Kanaglym]]. There, he met Midnight and apologized to her for his stupidity.{{cite book/Waterdeep|234-239|13}}
